StmtSimple.@StatementText: begin transaction

declare @current_step_id uniqueidentifier
declare @t_test_id uniqueidentifier 
declare @prev_step_id uniqueidentifier
declare @back_only_1_step char(1)
declare @back_btn_mark char(1)

select @current_step_id=current_step_id
from t_testing t inner join
t_testing_test tt on
t.t_testing_id=tt.t_testing_id
and t.current_test_id = tt.t_test_id
where t.t_testing_id=@t_testing_id
commit transaction
SET XACT_ABORT OFF;

begin
 
 set @t_test_id = (select current_test_id from t_testing  where t_testing_id=@t_testing_id )

/* what is th privious test step?  */
 set @prev_step_id = NULL

select @back_only_1_step=back_only_1_step,
 @back_btn_mark=back_btn_mark
 from t_test 
 where t_test_id = @t_test_id

create procedure [dbo].[get_prev_step_id] 
@current_step_id uniqueidentifier,
@prev_step_id uniqueidentifier OUTPUT

as 

declare @t_test_id uniqueidentifier
declare @step_order int
declare @prev_step_order int



select @t_test_id = t_test_id, @step_order=step_order
from t_test_step 
where t_test_step_id = @current_step_id

select @prev_step_order=max(step_order)
from t_test_step
where t_test_id=@t_test_id and step_order<@step_order

begin
  select @prev_step_id=t_test_step_id
  from t_test_step
  where t_test_id=@t_test_id and step_order=@prev_step_order

end
else 
set @prev_step_id = null

StmtCond.@StatementText:
/* in case if option back for test is disabled raise error  */
 if @back_btn_mark!='y'

StmtSimple.@StatementText:
begin 
    RAISERROR ('CURRENT TEST DOES NOT ALLOW BACK ACTION !',16,1,0) with log
commit transaction
return

StmtCond.@StatementText:
end

  
  
    if (@back_only_1_step = 'y') AND (select LEN(result_txt) from t_testing_step 
         where t_testing_id=@t_testing_id and t_test_step_id=@current_step_id)>0

ScalarOperator.@ScalarString: CASE WHEN [@back_only_1_step]='y' AND [Expr1005]>(0) THEN (1) ELSE (0) END
CASE WHEN [Expr1004]>(1) THEN (0) ELSE NULL END

StmtSimple.@StatementText:
begin
        RAISERROR ('TEST DOES NOT ALLOW BACK MORE THEN ONCE !',16,1,0) with log
commit transaction
return

StmtCond.@StatementText:
/* if step exists  change current_step_id */
 if  @prev_step_id is not null

StmtSimple.@StatementText:
begin
    update t_testing_test
    set current_step_id=@prev_step_id
    
    where t_testing_id = @t_testing_id
    and t_test_id=@t_test_id

update  
    t_testing_step 
    set 
    t_testing_step_status_id = 1,
    view_date=getdate()
    where t_test_step_id=@prev_step_id
    and t_testing_id = @t_testing_id

ScalarOperator.@ScalarString: CASE WHEN [Expr1018] IS NULL THEN (0) ELSE NULL END

StmtSimple.@StatementText:
end

    
  
end 
/* in case of attemtp to change not current step ERROR message */
else 
RAISERROR ('CURRENT STEP ID DOES NOT EQUIL PROPOSED! ANSWER NOT ACCEPTED!',16,1,0) with log
